body_html: Hey @yaroslavvb I just wanted to update you and let you know for right now, tcmalloc seems to have resolved the issue. I haven't fully trained all the way but so far, it does seem to be pretty stable! Thanks! I'll close for right now.

body: Hey @yaroslavvb I just wanted to update you and let you know for right now, `tcmalloc` seems to have resolved the issue. I haven't fully trained all the way but so far, it does seem to be pretty stable! Thanks! I'll close for right now.
